name: Revived Demon Priestess
description:
Currently set in a small island in Japan,
It is an "Open Island Erotic RPG" with a high degree of freedom.
(It's an open island because it's set on a small island, not an open world.)

After capturing the trial range, you will be able to go anywhere on the island wherever you like.
Manipulating the legendary shrine maiden "Miko" that has revived to the present,
Get rid of the monsters that appeared on the island and restore the peace of the island!

However, the legendary shrine maiden has lost her old memories,
It is completely unresistant to the monster's H attacks!

Please enjoy the legendary shrine maiden who is ignorant to H to your heart's content.
